com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.state

Class ClockSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gazbert.patterns.behavioural.state.ClockSetup

  • public class ClockSetup
extends java.lang.Object
    The state machine.

    All the different states are listed here.

    This class controls the state transitions and always 'knows' the current state.

    Author:
    gazbert

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClockSetup()
      Constructor initialises the state machine: It creates all the state objects and passes the state machine into each one.
